responses.text: Hold on a minute!  I'm the person your mole sent, to get in on it.
No way in hell, <name_b>.  You're gonna <swear> die!

dynamic_line: Oh yeah, yeah.  Not a lot of people who don't want me dead come to see me like that, makes ya get a bit jumpy.  Well, I guess you're good material if they'd reccommend you to me, just need your name and a few other things about'ch ya, so I can let the others know to not kill ya when you meet 'em.
